Detailed Description

template<class T>
class MessageMeanFilter< T >

Class that implements a mean filter for a given Topic type.

Ros-Parameter Desciption
~sample_number Number of samples the mean is calculated from
Template Parameters
TType of the topic to be filtered. Operators + and / must be implemented within the msg_operators namespace.
